title: Appalachian National Scenic Trail: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       Use the following pages to learn about the Appalachian National Scenic Trail as a teaching and learning resource.  Parks as Classrooms Information about using parks as classrooms, including:   Curriculum Materials Online Gallery     Professional Development Information on the nationally recognized Trail to Every Classroom program, including:   Description and listing of Teacher Workshops Suggested Readings and Resource List
